title: The fourth sermon preached at Hampton Court on Tuesday the last of Sept. 1606. By John Kinge Doctor of Divinity, and Deane of Christ-Church in Oxon
author: King, John, 1559?-1621.
publisher: Printed by Joseph Barnes printer to the Vniversitie,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.) Library.
